title.en: A Lament and Prayer to Invoke the Wisdom Mind of Khenchen Vāgindra on the Occasion of His Passing into the Great Peace of the Dharmadhātu

text.en: Namo guru!
Long ago you found perfect freedom and awakening,
text.en-trans: zö né namdrol changchub chok nyé kyang

text.en: Yet still out of exceptional love for beings to be trained
text.en-trans: duljé dro la lhakpar tuk tsewé

text.en: You magically appear in the form of a spiritual friend
text.en-trans: geweshé kyi nampar trulpa yi

text.en: And greatly benefit the teachings and beings—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ten drö dön chen dzé la solwa deb

text.en: Lord of Secrets, embodiment of all the buddhas’ power and strength,
text.en-trans: gyal kün tutob chikdü sangwé dak

text.en: In the guise of a saffron-robed monk for these degenerate times,
text.en-trans: nyikdü ngurmik changwé zuk su gyur

text.en: An adornment on the crown of myriad vajra holders of the triple vows—
text.en-trans: sumden dor dzin jewé tsuk gi gyen

text.en: Ngawang Samten Lodrö, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ngawang samten lodrö la solwa deb

text.en: Entirely without equal, you raised aloft in a hundred directions
text.en-trans: dü dré wangpo tsarpa chöjé yi

text.en: The victory banner of the teachings of the profound, secret oral transmission1
text.en-trans: zabsang nyengyü tenpé gyaltsen ni

text.en: From Tsarpa, Lord of Dharma and master of the enemy of time2—
text.en-trans: chok gyar dreng la drenda künpang pa

text.en: Khamtön Sangye Gyatso, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khamtön sangye gyatsor solwa deb

text.en: With fiery tongues of power, strength and capacity
text.en-trans: tutob nüpé zhuk ché barwa yi

text.en: You utterly incinerate the hosts of unruly spirits,
text.en-trans: marung jungpö tsok nam talwar lak

text.en: Naturally arisen great defender of teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: ten drö pungnyen chenpo rangjungwa

text.en: All-pervasive lord, glorious guru, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khyabdak palden lamar solwa deb

text.en: Precious guru, chief of oceanic maṇḍalas,
text.en-trans: kyilkhor gyatsö depön lama jé

text.en: You are none other than the heroic Mañjuśrī,
text.en-trans: khyen nü tsewa jampal pawo dang

text.en: Wise, powerful and caring in your supreme vajra form
text.en-trans: tadé ma chi dorjé ku chok la

text.en: That could never undergo birth or death.
text.en-trans: kyechi zukngu zhar yang ma chi kyang

text.en: Yet, as a means to counteract our impressions of endurance,
text.en-trans: tak dzin dokpé nyenpor zuk kyi kü

text.en: You have displayed the absorption of form into basic space.
text.en-trans: tröpa ying su timpar tenpé tsé

text.en: And now, protectorless, I wander alone in delusion’s darkness.
text.en-trans: gönmé dak ni marik münpar khyam

text.en: Look upon me with compassion, O guru: care for me!
text.en-trans: tukjé ngepar zik shik lama khyen

text.en: When a father does not aid a child in distress,
text.en-trans: bu yi dukngal pa yi ma sel na

text.en: Who else will assist in the elimination of faults?
text.en-trans: nyepa sel jé kyab zhen su zhik tsol

text.en: Alas and alack! O guru Vajradhara,
text.en-trans: kyema kyi hü lama dorjé chang

text.en: From the depths of my heart, I pray to you.
text.en-trans: nying né drenpé shuk kyi solwa deb

text.en: Let your cloud-like emanations gather in the sky of dharmadhātu
text.en-trans: chöying kha la trulpé trinpung trik

text.en: And rain down the blessings of your secret body, speech and mind.
text.en-trans: sangwa sum gyi jinlab druchar pob

text.en: Through this, may my own character ripen as the three secrets
text.en-trans: dak gyü sang sum dorjér minpar dzö

text.en: And bring forth the fine crop of accomplishing the guru’s four kāyas.
text.en-trans: lama ku zhi dré zang ngödrub tsol

text.en: Perfectly reveal infinite emanations according to disciples’ needs,
text.en-trans: gang dul trulpa pakyé rab tön né

text.en: To accomplish vast waves of activity on behalf of the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: ten dang drowé dön nyi lab chen drub

text.en: May I and all your other subjects perfectly maintain purest samaya
text.en-trans: dak sok lob bang damtsik nampar dak

text.en: And may we never ever part from you, the most sublime of gurus.
text.en-trans: lama chok dang namyang mindral shok
